## cilium kernel-check

Checks whether the system has required kernel capabilities

```
cilium kernel-check [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for kernel-check
  -o, --output string   json| jsonpath='{}'
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
```
